summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a Fircosoft alert related to Darren K Indyke, a director at Southern Trust Company Inc. The alert was reviewed and cleared by AML Compliance, indicating that it had been previously assessed without issues. The email outlines the process for compliance clearance and KYC approval.
